welcome_message_body: Welcome to La Paz, Mexico! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that La Paz has to offer.

restaurants.name: Panadería Beneite
restaurants.description: Panadería Beneite is a bakery located in Argentina, Mendoza.
restaurants.address: Independencia (Av. San Martin), 5590 Argentina, Mendoza, Mendoza, La Paz

restaurants.name: DejaVu
restaurants.description: DejaVu is a american restaurant located in La Paz.

restaurants.name: Parador La Paz
restaurants.description: Parador La Paz is a sandwich spot located in La Paz.
restaurants.address: Av. 25 De Mayo (Sarmiento), 5590 La Paz, Mendoza

airports.airport_name: General Manuel Márquez De León International Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
